name: Feta Shrimp Soup
author: CATHERINE
summary: A wonderful shrimp soup flavored with feta cheese, clam juice, white wine & tomatoes. Even the pickiest eaters in my family love it! Pinot Grigio is suggested for the wine.
ingredients: 1 pound medium shrimp - peeled and deveined
directions: Melt the butter and heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat
Stir in the onion and garlic, and cook until tender
Mix in the tomatoes, clam juice, and wine
Season with oregano, salt, and pepper
Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer 10 minutes
Transfer soup in batches to a blender, and puree until smooth
Return to the pot, and stir in feta cheese
Stir the shrimp into the soup, and continue cooking 3 minutes, or until shrimp are opaque
Mix in parsley just before serving
